thread.title: Title track of Salman Khan's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' is out
thread.title_full: Title track of Salman Khan's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' is out - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Title track of Salman Khan's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' is out
text:
Bollywood superstar Salman Khan has released the title track of his upcoming film 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' also featuring Sonam Kapoor in the lead.
*Watch the title track of 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo'*
After the success of 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan', this is Salman's much-awaited film and will feature him as Prem -- a name he has ... Â»
